title: itiswhatitis12345
author: itiswhatitis12345
content: I do have a puzzle with a prize of 0.1 BTC to whom solve it.A SHA256 hash that have meaningful sentence, find the meaningful sentence.The hash is:1ebe78b7efa5b19a592af53d796a67e7a1557e29f3b934985e8d7ed5d5967cbdGood luck

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Well 0.1BTC it is nice but i think that hardly someone is going to solve it.One question, What is the objetive of this challenge?Â  Lets to said that somebody found it, what you earn with this? What is proves?Do you have that amount in one address? can you make signature an address with that amount?

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: How do you solve this thing anyway?

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on November 04, 2023, 04:11:27 AMHow do you solve this thing anyway? You don't!QuoteSHA256 is a hashing algorithm. There is no direct method for SHA256 decryption.https://10015.io/tools/sha256-encrypt-decryptYou can try to brute force it, though. But good luck with that!
